exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.CheckBoxSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="checkbox_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="checkbox_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="checkbox_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="checkbox_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HScrollBarSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="8" width="30" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HSliderSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_sb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
             height="6" verticalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ItemRendererSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" text="{data}" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.PanelSkin" minHeight="230" minWidth="450" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="border_png" scale9Grid="2,2,12,12" />
    <e:Group id="moveArea" left="0" right="0" top="0" height="45">
        <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="header_png"/>
        <e:Label id="titleDisplay" size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0xFFFFFF"
                 wordWrap="false" left="15" right="5" verticalCenter="0"/>
    </e:Group>
    <e:Button id="closeButton" label="close" bottom="5" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ProgressBarSkin" minWidth="30" minHeight="18" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="track_pb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
			 height="100%" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" height="100%" width="100%" source="thumb_pb_png"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
			 size="15" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0x707070"
			 horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.RadioButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="radiobutton_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="radiobutton_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="radiobutton_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="radiobutton_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ScrollerSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:HScrollBar id="horizontalScrollBar" width="100%" bottom="0"/>
    <e:VScrollBar id="verticalScrollBar" height="100%" right="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="skins.TextInputSkin" minHeight="40" minWidth="300" states="normal,disabled,normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" source="button_up_png"/>
	<e:Rect height="100%" width="100%" fillColor="0xffffff"/>
 	<e:EditableText id="textDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0x000000" textColor.disabled="0xff0000" width="100%" height="24" size="20" />
	<e:Label id="promptDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0xa9a9a9" width="100%" height="24" size="20" touchEnabled="false" includeIn="normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ToggleSwitchSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image source="on_png"
             source.up="off_png"
             source.down="off_png"
             source.disabled="off_png"/>
    <e:Image source="handle_png"
             horizontalCenter="-18"
             horizontalCenter.upAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.downAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.disabledAndSelected="18"
             verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VScrollBarSkin" minWidth="8" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="30" width="8" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VSliderSkin" minWidth="25" minHeight="30" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="7" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" horizontalCenter="0" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="AttentionLayerSkin" width="640" height="1008" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
	<w:Config id="15ce852dbd5" ></w:Config>
	<e:Rect width="640" height="1008" x="0" y="0" fillAlpha="0.7"/>
	<e:Image source="p1_01_png" x="40.5" y="227.94"/>
	<e:Image source="p1_02_png" x="187.5" y="290.82"/>
	<e:Image id="alreadyBtn" source="p1_03_png" x="144" y="470.5"/>
	<e:Image id="nowBtn" source="p1_04_png" x="364.5" y="470.5"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="AwardLayerSkin" width="640" height="1008" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
	<w:Config id="15d1bf30f95" ></w:Config>
	<e:Rect width="640" height="1008" x="0" y="0" fillAlpha="0.7"/>
	<e:Image source="p1_01_png" x="40.5" y="262"/>
	<e:Image id="IknowBtn" source="p12_02_png" x="247.5" y="700"/>
	<e:Image source="p10_1_png" x="243.5" y="284"/>
	<e:Label id="TextLabel" text="" x="82" y="366" anchorOffsetX="0" width="470" anchorOffsetY="0" height="230" textColor="0x5c5c5e" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" size="40"/>
	<e:Image id="getCardBtn" source="getCardBtn_png" x="247.5" y="700"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="EditerLayerSkin" width="640" height="1008" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
	<w:Config id="15ce8fc5db2" ></w:Config>
	<e:Rect width="640" height="1008" x="0" y="0" fillAlpha="0.7"/>
	<e:Image source="InfoBox_png" x="33.5" y="189.94"/>
	<e:Label text="姓名：" x="94" y="373" anchorOffsetX="0" width="122.49" anchorOffsetY="0" height="51.21" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" size="40" textColor="0x4a4a4b"/>
	<e:Label text="手机：" x="97.51" y="498.4" anchorOffsetX="0" width="122.49" anchorOffsetY="0" height="51.21" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" size="40" textColor="0x4A4A4B"/>
	<e:Rect width="294.24" height="2" x="228.92" y="426.27" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" fillColor="0x4A4A4B"/>
	<e:Rect width="294.24" height="2" x="229" y="541" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" fillColor="0x4a4a4b"/>
	<e:Image id="confirmBtn" source="confirm_png" x="229" y="642"/>
	<e:EditableText id="inputName" width="310" height="60" text="" x="220" y="366" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" textColor="0x4a4a4b"/>
	<e:EditableText id="inputPhone" width="310" height="60" text="" x="213.16" y="479.61" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" textColor="0x4A4A4B" maxChars="11"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="GiftItemSkin" width="610" height="110" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
	<w:Config id="15ce8ee519b" ></w:Config>
	<e:Label text="{data.name}" x="15.5" y="10" anchorOffsetX="0" width="581" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"/>
	<e:Label text="{data.code}" x="17.5" y="58.5" anchorOffsetX="0" width="582" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
	<e:Rect width="610" height="4" x="0" y="106" fillColor="0xffffff" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="GiftLayerSkin" width="640" height="1008" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui"
        xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<w:Config id="15ce8e8f7e7"></w:Config>
	<e:Rect width="640" height="1008" x="0" y="0" fillAlpha="0.7" />
	<e:Rect width="640" height="4" x="0" y="109.36" fillColor="0xffffff" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" />
	<e:Label text="奖品" x="47.3" y="35.51" size="50" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" />
	<e:Image id="closeBtn" source="Close_png" x="545.94" y="21.51" />
	<e:Scroller width="610" height="862" x="10" y="124" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0">
		<e:Group>
			<e:List id="list" width="622" x="6" y="8"/>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Scroller>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="PopupLayerSkin" width="640" height="1008" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
	<w:Config id="15ce8f58f8b" ></w:Config>
	<e:Rect width="640" height="1008" x="0" y="0" fillAlpha="0.7"/>
	<e:Group id="PopupLayerAni" width="595.88" height="620" x="26" y="-620" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0">
		<e:Image source="p1_01_png" x="14.5" y="64" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image source="p12_01_png" x="217.5" y="86" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Label id="TextLabel" text="" x="56" y="168" anchorOffsetX="0" width="470" anchorOffsetY="0" height="230" textColor="0x5c5c5e" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" size="40" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image id="IknowBtn" source="p12_02_png" x="221.5" y="502" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="RankItemSkin" width="630" height="90" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
	<w:Config id="15ce8a10cae" ></w:Config>
	<e:Rect width="630" height="4" y="84.42" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" fillColor="0xffffff"/>
	<e:Label text="{data.No}" x="65.52" y="24.47" size="35" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" anchorOffsetX="0" width="84.75" anchorOffsetY="0" height="41.06" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
	<e:Label text="{data.name}" x="297.67" y="24.47" size="35" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" anchorOffsetX="0" width="167.42" anchorOffsetY="0" height="41.06" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
	<e:Label text="{data.score}" x="478.58" y="24.47" size="35" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" anchorOffsetX="0" width="150.42" anchorOffsetY="0" height="41.06" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
	<e:Image id="icon" width="61.33" height="61.33" x="207.66" y="14.33" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" source="{data.portrait}"/>
	<e:Image id="crown" width="64" height="64" x="1.52" y="13" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" source="{data.linebox}"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="RankLayerSkin" width="640" height="1008" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
	<w:Config id="15ce85ffd64" ></w:Config>
	<e:Rect width="640" height="1008" x="0" y="0" fillAlpha="0.7"/>
	<e:Rect width="640" height="4" x="0" y="109.36" fillColor="0xffffff" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0"/>
	<e:Label text="排行榜" x="47.3" y="35.51" size="50" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei"/>
	<e:Image id="closeBtn" source="Close_png" x="545.94" y="21.51"/>
	<e:Label text="排名" x="69.51" y="130" anchorOffsetX="0" width="80.06" anchorOffsetY="0" height="39.09" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" size="35"/>
	<e:Label text="头像" x="212.45" y="130" anchorOffsetX="0" width="80.06" anchorOffsetY="0" height="39.09" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" size="35"/>
	<e:Label text="昵称" x="356.36" y="130" anchorOffsetX="0" width="80.06" anchorOffsetY="0" height="39.09" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" size="35"/>
	<e:Label text="分数" x="529.88" y="130" anchorOffsetX="0" width="80.06" anchorOffsetY="0" height="39.09" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" size="35"/>
	<e:Scroller width="630" height="790" x="9" y="191" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0">
		<e:Group>
			<e:List id="list" width="630" height="790" x="-3.06" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0"/>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Scroller>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="RuleLayerSkin" width="640" height="1008" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui"
        xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<w:Config id="15ce8c02344"></w:Config>
	<e:Rect width="640" height="1008" x="0" y="0" fillAlpha="0.7" />
	<e:Rect width="640" height="4" x="0" y="109.36" fillColor="0xffffff" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" />
	<e:Label text="规则" x="47.3" y="35.51" size="50" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" />
	<e:Image id="closeBtn" source="Close_png" x="545.94" y="21.51"/>
	<e:Scroller width="620" height="860" x="11" y="123" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0">
		<e:Group>
			<e:Label id="ruleLabel" text="" x="12.12" y="0" width="600" size="30" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei"/>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Scroller>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="ShareLayerSkin" width="640" height="1008" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
	<w:Config id="15ce859dcef" ></w:Config>
	<e:Rect width="640" height="1008" x="0" y="0" fillAlpha="0.7"/>
	<e:Image source="shareBg_png" x="49.5" y="89.94"/>
	<e:Image id="IknowBtn" source="knowBtn_png" x="192.5" y="727.09"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="TipsLayerSkin" width="640" height="1008" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
	<w:Config id="15d1bd51432" ></w:Config>
	<e:Image id="tips" x="320" y="504" scaleX="0" scaleY="0" source="tip_png" anchorOffsetX="320" anchorOffsetY="504"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="HomeSceneSkin" width="640" height="1008" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:tween="egret.tween.*" >
	<w:Declarations>
	</w:Declarations>
	<w:Config id="15ce7495055" ></w:Config>
	<e:Image source="1-9_png" x="0" y="0" width="640"/>
	<e:Image id="playBtn" source="HomeStartBtn_png" x="-10.91" y="497.58" scaleX="0.1" scaleY="0.1" anchorOffsetX="90.91" anchorOffsetY="75.76"/>
	<e:Image id="ruleBtn" source="HomeRuleBtn_png" x="229.5" y="613.5"/>
	<e:Image id="rankBtn" source="RankingListBtn_png" x="232.5" y="702"/>
	<e:Image id="giftBtn" source="giftBtn_png" x="232.5" y="702" width="181" height="69"/>
	<e:Image source="1-1_png" x="94.5" y="110" visible="false"/>
	<e:Image id="blue" source="1-2_png" x="135.5" y="850"/>
	<e:Image id="pink" source="1-3_png" x="283.5" y="862"/>
	<e:Image id="yellow" source="1-4_png" x="415.5" y="857"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="OverSceneSkin" width="640" height="1008" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
	<w:Config id="15ce7ae83f9" ></w:Config>
	<e:Group id="overSceneAni" width="640" height="1008" x="320" y="504" anchorOffsetX="320" anchorOffsetY="504" scaleX="1" scaleY="1">
		<e:Image source="p5_01_png" x="320" y="504" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" anchorOffsetX="320" anchorOffsetY="504" height="1008"/>
		<e:Image id="rankBtn" source="p5_04_png" x="439" y="779" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image id="giftBtn" source="p5_07_png" x="439" y="779" width="201" height="77"/>
		<e:Image id="shareBtn" source="p5_05_png" x="0" y="779" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image id="againBtn" source="p5_06_png" x="219.5" y="779" width="201" height="77" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Label text="你的分数" x="186.03" y="497.44" anchorOffsetX="0" width="261.88" anchorOffsetY="0" height="72.42" textColor="0xff0000" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" size="50" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Label id="score" text="" x="245" y="614.91" size="50" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" textColor="0xff0000" width="150" height="50" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="PlaySceneSkin" width="640" height="1008" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:tween="egret.tween.*" >
	<w:Declarations>
	</w:Declarations>
	<w:Config id="15ce7648da1" ></w:Config>
	<e:Image source="PlayBg_png" x="0" y="0"/>
	<e:Image source="2-3_png" x="266.5" y="42.88"/>
	<e:Image source="2-2_png" x="12" y="45.88"/>
	<e:Image source="欢乐消除2-32_png" x="387.5" y="45.88"/>
	<e:Group id="CountDownAni" width="640" height="1008" x="0" y="0" visible="false">
		<e:Image id="a" source="2-7-1_png" x="0" y="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image id="b" source="2-7_png" x="0" y="145.27" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" visible="false"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Image source="2-6_png" x="19.97" y="174.27"/>
	<e:Label id="targetScore" text="" x="102" y="71" anchorOffsetX="0" width="115" anchorOffsetY="0" height="33" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei"/>
	<e:Label id="levelScore" text="" x="483.52" y="71" anchorOffsetX="0" width="115" anchorOffsetY="0" height="33" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei"/>
	<e:Label id="time" text="00" x="289" y="58.54" anchorOffsetY="0" height="55" anchorOffsetX="0" width="66" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" fontFamily="Microsoft JhengHei" bold="true" border="false" blendMode="add" horizontalCenter="2" strokeColor="0xff962d" stroke="2" size="50" textColor="0xff4c00" borderColor="0xff8402" multiline="true" wordWrap="true" backgroundColor="0xed1515" visible="false"/>
	<e:Image id="timeTen" x="286" y="60" source="2_png"/>
	<e:Image id="timeOne" source="0_png" x="320.5" y="60"/>
</e:Skin>
